word:
It is a mistake to withdraw from those who do not agree with our ideas. This will not inspire our brethren 
                                                                           31
with confidence in our judgment. It is our duty to counsel with our brethren, and to heed their advice. We are to seek their counsel, and when they give it, we are not to cast it away, as if they were our enemies. Unless we humble our hearts before God, we shall not know His will.
